title: Is This Pain Our Pleasure (Live)
lyrics:
(Intro) 
Sometimes, relationships, ya know 
Somehow they just don't work out 
You gotta do what you gotta do 
You know... 


(Verse 1) 

Damn, we tried so hard to get it right 

But this relationship has been denied 

Between the sheets we thought that 

Everything would be alright 

Talk, that's something we both used to do 

But now you always got an attitude 

Don't know what we're supposed to do 

And I don't know what to say, but... 



(Chorus) 

Is this pain our pleasure 

'Cause all we do is fight 

Been so wrong for so long, girl 

That it's feeling right 

Is this pain our pleasure 

'Cause all we do is fight 

Been so wrong for so long, girl 

That it's feeling right 



(Verse 2) 

I'm looking at you baby, lookin' so good 

When any man sees you, it's understood 

Why I would do the things I do 

Just to be with you 

Oh I love you 

And then sometimes I feel that I can't stand you 

But I just can't bring myself to leave you 

And you keep pushing me away from you 

And I don't know what to say, hey... 



(Chorus) 



(Bridge) 

Oh why, oh why, oh why 

Do we do what we do, baby 

And why we fuss and fight 

Between me and you, baby 



(Chorus) x 2 



Good-bye, good-bye 

Good-bye, good-bye 

Good-bye, good-bye 

Good-bye, good-bye... 





(Thanks to Mokz for these lyrics)
